channel.title: Autosave
channel.description: How would i go about making my server save everyones acc every 10 minutes?

item.title: Autosave
item.dc:creator: @zackary zackary
item.description:
@zackary wrote:

already have that. but i’d like it to be auto because we all know not everyone saves their game

Read full topic

item.title: Autosave
item.dc:creator: @chaosplaya09 chaosplaya09
item.description:
@chaosplaya09 wrote:

You Could Put A [Save] Button In The Quest Tab

HERE IT IS:

c.sendFrame126(“Save Game”, ####);

and then in the clicking buttons:

case ####:
c.saveGame();
c.sendMessage(“Your game has been saved!”);

Read full topic

item.description:

Personally, I’d use a separate thread to save games every so often.

item.title: Autosave
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“chaosplaya09, post:6, topic:525131”]… well do you see // infront of it?

Like This:
//public static final int SAVE_TIMER = 120; // save every 1 minute[/quote]
This definitely will not work unless he actually has a loop or timing system. Basically all you are telling him to do with that is to declare and initialize a variable, which is completely redundant since it doesn’t do anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Autosave
item.dc:creator: @zackary zackary
item.description:
@zackary wrote:

its there. but it doesn’t save every minute like it says it does. when there are rollbacks. the rollbacks take u back atleast 10-15mins

Read full topic

item.title: Autosave
item.dc:creator: @chaosplaya09 chaosplaya09
item.description:
@chaosplaya09 wrote:

look for CRYSTAL_BOW_DEGRADES

should look like this:

You should see this:

[code] public static final boolean CORRECT_ARROWS = true; // correct arrows for bows?
public static final boolean CRYSTAL_BOW_DEGRADES = true; // magic rune required?

public static final int NPC_RANDOM_WALK_DISTANCE = 5; // the square created , 3x3 so npc can't move out of that box when randomly walking[/code]

Now add this on top of NPC_RANDOM_WALK_DISTANCE:

Should look like this

[code] public static final boolean CORRECT_ARROWS = true; // correct arrows for bows?
public static final boolean CRYSTAL_BOW_DEGRADES = true; // magic rune required?

public static final int SAVE_TIMER = 120; // save every 1 minute
public static final int NPC_RANDOM_WALK_DISTANCE = 5; // the square created , 3x3 so npc can't move out of that box when randomly walking[/code]

Compile
And your done.

Read full topic

item.description:

yes it PI

item.title: Autosave
item.dc:creator: @chaosplaya09 chaosplaya09
item.description:
@chaosplaya09 wrote:

Look For This In Your Config.Java

	public static final int SAVE_TIMER = 30;

If You Cannot Find This, Then Add It.
(I Think Only Works For PI, IDK)

Add This If Your Server Is [PI] Based. If It Isnt Try It With Your Base It Might Work.

Read full topic
